snippet: Gary Gensler leaves the Commodity Futures Trading Commission at an inflection point. | FireEye has acquired the cyberforensics firm Mandiant. | Bankers see an abundance of opportunity for I.P.O.’s this year. | A storm pummeled the New York region...
abstract: Gary Gensler leaves the Commodity Futures Trading Commission at an inflection point. | FireEye has acquired the cyberforensics firm Mandiant. | Bankers see an abundance of opportunity for I.P.O.’s this year. | A storm pummeled the New York region overnight.

byline.original: By WILLIAM ALDEN and SYDNEY EMBER

headline.main: Gensler Bids Farewell to Trading Commission
